pages.text: You can outfit your cat with accessories to make them look stylish and cool.

pages.title: Cape
pages.text: You can make a cape to put on your cat, using any color of wool. You'll love it; not sure the cat will....

pages.title: Multi-colored Collar
pages.text: Creates a colorful collar for your kitty!

pages.title: Radio Collar
pages.text: The radio collar will help you keep track of your cat when you're far away or get lost.

pages.title: Spotted Collar
pages.text: Another type of collar for your cat.

pages.title: Wool Collar
pages.text: The basic type of collar. You can use this collar as the base for creating the fancier collars.
